bioconda.name: bioconductor-qusage
bioconda.summary: qusage: Quantitative Set Analysis for Gene Expression

biotools.summary: Implementation of the QUantitative Set Analysis for Gene Expression, a novel gene set enrichment-type test designed to provide a faster, more accurate, and easier to understand test for gene expression studies. It accounts for inter-gene correlations using the variance inflation factor technique, quantifying the deviation from a null hypothesis with a P value and a probability density function.

bioschemas.name: qusage
